1263280.name: Mega Man Zero 4 Original Soundtrack
1263280.description:
The original soundtrack for Mega Man Zero 4 has been remastered, complete with 32 tracks!
*Includes "Promise - Next New World", recorded for the first time and available exclusively in the game.
*Includes art by official illustrator Toru Nakayama!

The 76+ minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
